transcript:
Customer: Hello? Hello?
Executive: Hello. Sir good morning.
Customer: Ha boliye na madam.
Executive: Good morning sir.
Customer: Good morning good morning.
Executive: Ji kaise hain aap?
Customer: Bas badhiya.
Executive: Ha. Main ye keh rahi thi ki aapke buylead vagera jaise roz consume kar rahe hain, hai na?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To abhi aapne jaise ye buylead consume kari hui hai, ek second bata rahi hu. Tissue culture G9 banana plants ki aaj ki date mein.
Customer: Ha ye. Ha abhi savere ki hai.
Executive: Ha ha. To Jalgaon ki hai sir ye. Isme buyer se kya baat-vaat hui aapki kuch?
Customer: Ha baat ho gayi. Unhone kaha hai saat aath din ka bole.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Saat aath din mein confirm kar dunga aisa bole.
Executive: Achcha okay. To aur ye bataiye aap jaise mujhse discuss kar rahe the, bol rahe the ki aapke account manager hain jaise TrustSeal ke liye baat hui thi aapse meri. To aap bol rahe the ki aapka paisa vagera account block vagera ho gaya hai to wo abhi problem jo thi wo resolve ho gayi aapki?
Customer: Nahi nahi madam wo lock hi hai abhi bhi.
Executive: Achcha. To sir aap unke address pe gaye nahi? Unse baat-vaat nahi kari aapne?
Customer: Nahi nahi baat ho gayi. Aur main income tax office bhi hui thi. To unko main bola ki wo bole theek hai CA ko bhej do aapko aane ka jarurat nahi. Abhi CA bolta hai ki aap idhar aa jao. Pichli baar to main gaya tha par wo aaye hi nahi the. Pichli baar mein aaj ka chaar-paanch din waste kiya unke chakkar mein.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Pichli baar to aaye nahi. Abhi abhi bol rahe hai abhi main to bahar hu dusre state mein. Abhi bolte hai kya ki aa jao phir hum chalte hai. Achcha. Income tax office bata rahe hai ki unko khali bhej do to main turant release kar deta hu aisa. Aur mera phone bhi nahi uthate block kar rakha hai. Dusre number se phone karta hu.
Executive: Aapne dusre number se call kari?
Customer: Ha switch kiya na dusre number se switch kiya.
Executive: Fir baat-vaat ho gayi na aapki?
Customer: Ha baat to ho gayi par wo theek nahi hai abhi ek saal se ghuma rahe hai madam. Kam se kam ek saal ho gaye.
Executive: Ek saal se ghuma rahe hain?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To dekh lo aap discuss kar lo aap.
Customer: Paisa bhi unko de diya madam maine. 30,000 cash de diya tha aur 30,000 ka check bhi diya tha aur.
Executive: Sir thoda sa aapko dekh ke dena chahiye na kisi ko paisa vagera de rahe hain agar aap.
Customer: Office to office to hai udhar unka par wo bas ghuma rahe hai time pass bas baki kuch nahi.
Executive: Achcha. To ab aap ye batao jaise wo to chalo aapka ek ho gaya. Agar aap wo karenge to wo aapke hi account mein aayega. Aapka account unlock hoga. Aapke khate mein paisa aayega aapka jo unhone aapne unko diya hai. Theek hai? Abhi aapka jo TrustSeal ka maine Diwali se aapko Diwali ke pehle se discuss hua hai.
Customer: Ha nahi TrustSeal ka karna karna hai madam. Ye koi bhi ek-do deal nikal jaye na din to main.
Executive: Suno to aap baat to suno pehle. Main ye keh rahi hu na sir aapko jaise maine aapko Diwali ke pehle jo price bataya tha. Wahi price thoda sa badh gaya Diwali ke baad. Theek hai? Fir aapne hold bhi karane ko bola tha. To approve bhi kar diya tha proposal aapne. Fir humne hold bhi kara diya tha. To abhi kya hai ki ab wo prices na din pe din badhte hi ja rahe hain. To aap jitna delay karoge aapka price badhta hi jayega. To sir aap batao na jo price abhi aapko kam mein mil raha tha. Wahi aage jaake aapko badh ke mil jayega to phir kya hi benefit hoga aapko. To aapka ek tarah se price ke mein thoda hai na madam isme tha.
Customer: Nahi chalega na madam abhi.
Executive: Alag jagah se. Hello.
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Hello?
Executive: Ha bolo bolo sir.
Customer: Main kar deta hu isliye naya kuch deal mil jaye na ek-do. To isme main mere ko naye deal chahiye the. Matlab naye naam se karna tha ye.
Executive: Aap ha sir aap sahi keh rahe hain. I understand main samajh gayi hu. Theek hai fund ka koi issue chal raha hai. But aap agar dekh lo kahin se agar arrange ho sakta hai aap to isko kar lete hain sir kyunki ye best hai abhi.
Customer: Chaliye main madam main call karta hu aapko ek 20 ek minute mein kar dunga.
Executive: Theek hai achcha phir call.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's account is blocked; money stuck.

- Feels cheated by Income Tax office.

- TrustSeal price increased after Diwali.



Resolution:

- Executive explained TrustSeal price increase.

- Executive advised arranging funds for TrustSeal.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back in 20 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, trustseal, account block, buyleads
